Ayesha Khan.description: attending classes at Oak Hill College library (conversing about collaborating on promoting diversity and inclusion in the community through organizing a poetry reading event that showcases Black-owned businesses, amplifies Black LGBTQ+ voices, ensures accessibility for all attendees, educates on allyship and privilege, celebrates cultural diversity, involves local organizations supporting the Black LGBTQ+ community, empowers young Black leaders, addresses unconscious bias and microaggressions, uplifts marginalized voices, and continuously educates on systemic inequalities and unconscious bias.) @ the Ville:Oak Hill College:library:library table
